meanings.sent1: The vulned soldier bravely continued to fight despite his injury.
meanings.sent2: The doctor carefully treated the vulned arm of the patient.
meanings.sent3: The vulned puppy wagged its tail happily, unaware of its wound.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt vulned after the betrayal by her closest friend.
meanings.sent5: The vulned tree stood tall, bearing the scars of many storms.

meanings.sent1: The vulned bird struggled to fly with its hurt wing.
meanings.sent2: She showed kindness by helping the vulned cat on the roadside.
meanings.sent3: The vulned car limped along the road, in need of repair.
meanings.sent4: His pride was vulned when he failed the test he studied hard for.
meanings.sent5: The vulned flower wilted, unable to recover from the damage.
